text: unako siva usake jise ham chaahen koee nahin kha sakata aur (unaka ye bhee khyaal hai) ki kuchh chaarapae aise hain jinakee peeth par savaaree laadana haraam kiya gaya aur kuchh chaarapae aise hai jin par (zibah ke vakt) khuda ka naam tak nahin lete aur phir yah dhakosale (khuda kee taraph manasoob karate) hain ye sab khuda par ifatera va bohataan hai khuda unake ifatera paradaaziyon ko bahut jald saza dega
